title: Upbounders: Picnic Panic Board Game for Kids 4-6, Super Easy to Learn Cooperative Game About a Fun Cookout for Preschool Boys Girls (Eco-friendly)
features: IT'S ALMOST PICNIC TIME: In this colorful cooperative game, players work together to collect all the supplies needed for an awesome cookout! You’ve got a lot of stuff to gather before the guests arrive, but don’t worry – there are shortcuts.

EASY TO PLAY: With vibrant illustrations and simple gameplay, toddlers will quickly learn the rules and start playing with family and friends. Players roll the oversized die and move around up and down the board.

BELONGING BEGINS WITH PLAY: Founded by a mom, Upbounders is a toy company like no other. Our original artwork features multicultural and inclusive scenes reflective of the joyfully diverse world of today's kids.

AGES 4-6: For 2-4 players. Game includes a game board, 1 oversized wooden die (more fun than a spinner & perfect for little hands!), player & guests pawns, color matched target cards & instructions all printed on certified eco-friendly paper & paperboard.
CLASSROOM ESSENTIAL: This cooperative game aids in social emotional development, strategy, and builds shared decision making skills all while cultivating a sense of belonging in children.
description: Experience the fun and excitement of teamwork with Upbounders Picnic Panic cooperative board game for kids! Players work together to gather all the supplies needed to throw an awesome backyard cookout. You’ve got a lot of stuff to gather, but don’t worry – there are shortcuts. Perfect for families and friends, this engaging game promotes social skills, critical thinking, and problem-solving. With bright and colorful graphics and simple yet challenging gameplay, kids will be entertained for hours. Our cooperative board game is designed for 2 to 4 players and is suitable for children aged 4 and up. This classic kids game makes for a great birthday gift for preschool boys and girls. It's the perfect addition to any child's game collection, and a great way to bond with children and spend quality family time together! Encourage your child to challenge their mind and expand their cognitive skills and hand-eye coordination. Eco-friendly and printed with nontoxic inks. Upbounders by Little Likes Kids is a women-owned, certified-minority business founded by a mother who wanted toy options for her son that reflected his friends and his experiences. Each unique game’s design uses bright and playful original artwork to represent diversity, fun, and love, making them excellent classroom supplies for preschool and kindergarten teachers. Our first board games for kids 4-6 are designed to teach in a visual-spatial manner, specifically catering to hands-on learners and providing children from an early age a clear picture of what families are like and how each one is different in its own unique way.
